title.en: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner

description.en: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

description.ar:
أصبحت امرأة شريرة ماتت على يد زوجها في الرواية ، على وجه التحديد كشخصية داعمة تموت أثناء استخدامها كأداة للزواج السياسي من قبل والدها وشقيقها . وفي يوم من الأيام ، أحضر الأب أخيزا عريسها ... المشكلة أن الشخص الآخر هو الزوج الذي سيقتلني وأفضل فارس مقدس في الشمال الذي سيدمر الأسرة في المستقبل . أولا وقبل كل شيء ، يجب أن أجد طريقة للعيش . هناك العديد من الصعوبات مثل برودة الزوج ، وازدراء الدوق ، لكن يبدو أنه غير مؤذ للناس هنا . " لقد وقعت في حبك ! " لذا أرجوك أنقذني !

description.en:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---

description.es:
Me convertí en Rudbekia, la villana dentro de una novela de fantasía que sería asesinada a manos de su marido. El maldito de mi padre, ya ha decidido con quien me volveré a casar a través de un matrimonio político. El principal problema, es que mi futuro esposo es quien me matara. Necesito encontrar una forma de sobrevivir. Si actuó inofensivamente ante la gente del Norte, si protejo a la hermana de mi marido, a quien maté en la historia original, y si finjo estar completamente enamorada de él, ¿tal vez me perdone la vida? —¡Me he enamorado de tí! ¡Así que por favor sálvame!

---

description.fa:
در قسمت های اصلی رمان، من یه فرد شرور بودم که توسط پدر و برادر بزرگترم به عنوان یه ابزار سیاسی استفاده میشدم و در نهایت به دست شوهر آیندم کشته شدم. پدرم برای نجات پادشاهی خودش به شدت به داماد پنجم التماس میکرد که با من ازدواج کنه. مشکل اینه که مردی که قراره باهاش ازدواج کنم، شوالیه افسانه ای شمال، همون مردیه که در نهایت من و تمام خانوادم رو میکشه. "باید راهی برای زنده موندن پیدا کنم." داخل خود رمان چالش های دلهره آور زیادی پیشه رو هس. من باید راهی برای نجات خواهر کوچک شوهرم پیدا کنم، بر ظاهر سرد شوهرم پیروز شم، حمایت مردم شمال رو به دست بیارم و دربرابر اتفاقات عجیب با موجودات عجیبی دووم بیارم که در حال حاضر همه اینا منو به یه فرد انتقام جو تبدیل میکنن. "عاشق توعم!" "پس لطفاً منو نکش!"

description.fr:
Dans le roman, elle est devenue une méchante qui est morte des mains de son mari. Pour être plus précis, elle est devenue un personnage secondaire qui est morte en étant utilisée comme un outil pour un mariage politique par son père et son frère. Un jour, mon satané père est sorti en rampant et a choisi mon cinquième marié. Le problème est que la personne choisie était le meilleur paladin du Nord et la personne même qui me tuera moi et ma famille dans le futur. D’abord, je dois trouver un moyen de vivre. Dans le roman, avant de trouver un moyen de sauver ma belle-sœur qui allait mourir de mes mains, il y a de nombreux défis que je dois surmonter. Par exemple, faire fondre l’extérieur froid de mon mari, gagner les faveurs des gens du Nord et surmonter le mépris du duc. Si je peux surmonter ces défis, ma vie ne sera-t-elle pas sauvée plus tard? «Je suis tombé amoureux de toi !» Alors s’il te plaît, épargne-moi!

---
Une jeune coréenne est réincarnée dans le corps de Rudbeckia de Borgia, la seule fille du pape. Cependant, Rudbeckia est destinée à mourir des mains de son époux après avoir été utilisée comme outil dans un mariage politique. Prenant les devants pour changer son destin, elle décide de gagner l'affection de Izek van Omerta du royaume de Britannia, paladin, neveu du roi et héritier du duché d'Omerta. Rudbeckia pourra-t-elle empêcher le meurtre de sa belle-sœur, assassinat qui lui avait coûté la vie? Et Izek, celui qui est supposé tuer Rudbeckia dans le futur, se rangera-t-il aux côtés de son épouse?

---

description.it:
Nelle righe originali del romanzo, ero una malvagia, usata come strumento politico da mio padre e mio fratello maggiore, che finì per morire per mano del mio futuro marito. Per salvare il suo regno, mio padre pregò disperatamente Isaac di Omerta di sposarmi. Il problema è che l'uomo che dovrei sposare, il leggendario cavaliere del Nord, è lo stesso uomo che finirà per uccidere me e tutta la mia famiglia. Devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere! All'interno del romanzo stesso, ci sono molte sfide scoraggianti: devo trovare un modo per salvare la sorellina di mio marito, conquistare il mio freddo marito e ottenere il sostegno della gente del Nord, che attualmente mi disprezza. "Sono innamorata di lei!" Riuscirò nell'impresa?

---
In un romanzo, è diventata una malvagia che è morta tra le mani di suo marito. Per la precisione, come "attrice" non protagonista, una cattiva che muore dopo essere stata utilizzata come strumento per un matrimonio strategico da suo padre e suo fratello. Un giorno, il mio dannato padre ha strisciato e ha offerto la mia mano al mio quinto sposo. Il problema è che lui è proprio il marito che mi ucciderà e il miglior paladino del nord che in futuro distruggerà la mia famiglia. Per prima cosa, devo trovare un modo per sopravvivere. Nel romanzo ci sono molte difficoltà, come il freddo disprezzo di mio marito, l'odio e il bisogno di controllo dei nordisti e il disprezzo dei contadini, prima di trovare un modo per salvarmi la vita, dovrò risolvere diversi problemi. "Sono innamorata di te!" Quindi, per favore, salvami!

---

description.ko:
판타지 소설 속 남편의 손에 죽는
악역 조연, ‘루드베키아’가 되었다.

이 세계의 망할 아버지는 내 정략결혼 상대를 또 물어왔다.
문제는 그 상대가 바로 날 죽이게 될 남편이라는 것!

일단은 살길을 찾아야 한다.

북부 사람들에게 최대한 무해하게 보이면서
원작에서 내가 죽일 남편의 여동생도 지키고,
남편에겐 사랑에 빠진 척하면 목숨은 살려주지 않을까?

“전 당신한테 반해버렸어요!”

그러니까 제발 살려줘!

description.pt:
Me tornei ‘Rudbeckia’, uma coadjuvante em uma história de fantasia, uma vilã que morre pelas mãos de seu marido. O pior pai do mundo me achou outro parceiro para um casamento político. O problema é, essa pessoa é o marido que vai me matar! Primeiro, preciso achar uma forma para viver. Preciso parecer o mais inofensiva possível para o povo do norte e proteger a irmãzinha do meu marido que matei na história original. Não seria capaz de salvar minha vida se fingisse estar apaixonada pelo meu marido?

“Me apaixonei por você à primeira vista!”

“Então, por favor, me poupe!”

description.ru:
Рудвекиа де Ворхиа является сикстинским ангелом и принцессой Романии, которой предначертано умереть от руки собственного мужа. После того как она стала обычным инструментом в руках верховного понтифика католической церкви и своего старшего брата, она вынуждена вступить в политический брак с лучшим паладином севера, который в будущем должен убить весь ее дом. Теперь девушка должна будет столкнуться с многочисленными трудностями, но ей придется приспособиться и выжить в новых условиях. Сначала ей придется доказать, что она не является опасностью для других людей, потому людям не стоит ее опасаться. Дальше же ей придется убедить всех людей в том, что она совершенно непричастна к делам понтифика и семьи.

description.tr:
Kocasının ellerinde ölen bir kötü kadın karakterin bedenine reenkarne oldum. Daha doğrusu, babası ve erkek kardeşi tarafından siyasi evlilik aracı olarak kullanılırken ölen bir yardımcı karakter oldum. Bir gün, lanet olası babam gitti ve beşinci kocamı seçti. Sorun şu ki, seçilen kişi Kuzey'in en iyi Paladin'i, dahası gelecekte beni ve ailemi öldürecek olan kişiydi. Önce yaşamanın bir yolunu bulmalıyım. Romanda benim ellerimde ölecek olan biricik kız kardeşini kurtarmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce aşmam gereken birçok zorluk var. Kocamın soğuk yüzünü eritmek, Kuzeyli'nin beğenisini kazanmak ve Dük'ün küçümsemesini yenmek gibi. Bu zorlukların üstesinden gelebilirsem, hayatım sonunda kurtulmuş olmaz mı? "Sana aşık oldum!" Bu yüzden lütfen beni bağışla!

description.uk:
Вона стала злодійкою, яка померла від рук свого чоловіка в романі. Точніше, вона стала другорядною героїнею, яка померла, коли її батько і брат використовували як інструмент політичного шлюбу. По-перше, я маю знайти спосіб вижити у романі, знайти спосіб врятувати сестру мого чоловіка, яка в оригіналі померла від моїх рук, мені потрібно розтопити холодне серце мого чоловіка, завоювати прихильність населення та подолати презирство герцога. Якщо я зможу подолати ці труднощі, чи не буде моє життя врятовано пізніше? «Я закохався в тебе!» Тож будь ласка, пощади мене!

description.vi:
Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết gốc, tôi là một nhân vật phản diện - người được cha và anh trai sử dụng như một công cụ chính trị và cũng là người hết dưới tay chồng tương lai của mình. Để cứu vương quốc, cha tôi đã tuyệt vọng cầu xin chú rể nắm lấy tay tôi và kết hôn. Vấn đề là người đàn ông mà tôi phải kết hôn chính là hiệp sĩ huyền thoại của phương Bắc và cũng là người đàn ông sẽ tiêu diệt tôi và cả gia đình. Tôi phải tìm cách tồn tại. Trong cuốn tiểu thuyết, có rất nhiều thử thách khó khăn dc đặt ra cho tôi: tôi phải tìm cách cứu em gái của chồng mình, giành dc trái tim của người chồng lạnh lùng và có dc sự ủng hộ của người dân phương Bắc và tất cả những người hiện tại coi thường tôi. "Em yêu anh!" Vì vậy, xin anh đừng giết em!!

title.en: Because Janitor-san Is Not a Hero

altTitles.ja: 用務員さんは勇者じゃありませんので

altTitles.ja-ro: Yomuin-san wa Yuusha ja Arimasenno de

description.en: A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isn’t a student or the homeroom teacher… it’s the janitor.
description.ru:
Школьный уборщик Хасэбэ Курандо переносится в другой мир с помощью заклинания, вызывающего героев. Вместе с 78 другими учениками и учителями, которые также были призваны, Бог наделил его особыми способностями, чтобы он смог выжить в суровом мире в качестве героя... В разгар телепортации силу Курандо неожиданно крадёт ученик, и он остается в пучине отчаяния без посторонней помощи.
— Верни мне мою силу. Раз так, я хочу оказаться в безлюдном месте, где не придется иметь с ними дело... В ярости, Курандо умоляет Бога отправить его подальше от людей, одного в сильный холод . Но это лишь начало его приключений...

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

description.de:
Alle Schurken sind besiegt und die Helden haben die Welt gerettet. Das klingt erst einmal gut, doch sind wirklich alle Helden gut? Nicht alle, die sich „Helden“ nennen, verhalten sich auch so: Eine Frau, deren Schwester von einem dieser „Helden“ getötet wurde, begibt sich auf die Mission, den Täter zu finden, und wird zum „Hero-Killer“, der jede Nacht Jagd auf korrupte Helden macht. Kann sie es schaffen, ihre Schwester zu rächen und die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3403)
description.en:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?
description.es:
El mundo está en constante agitación, con guerras constantes desatándose entre héroes y villanos. Dotada con habilidades extraordinarias, una chica solitaria recorre un camino sangriento de venganza contra las injusticias del mundo en el que vive. Con los enfrentamientos constantes entre los titanes, nadie está a salvo. Si nadie está dispuesto a proteger a los inocentes, ¿quiénes son los verdaderos héroes? ¿Quiénes son los verdaderos villanos? ¿Qué es lo que realmente separa a los unos de los otros?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3422)
description.fr:
Dotée de capacités surnaturelles, Ehwa, une jeune fille solitaire, s'engage sur un chemin sanglant afin de se venger pour sa soeur qui a été tuée par un "héros". Elle ne sait toujours pas qui de ces "héros" est responsable de sa mort, mais cela lui importe peu... car il suffit de les massacrer tous.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3151)
description.hu: A világ állandó kavarodásban van, állandó háborúk törnek ki a Hősök és a Gonoszok között. Természetfölötti képességekkel felruházva egy magányos lány véres útra indul, hogy bosszút álljon a világ igazságtalanságai ellen, amelyben él. Ha senki sem hajlandó megvédeni az ártatlanokat, kik az igazi hősök és kik az igazi gonosztevők? Mi választja el igazán a másikat?
description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, Ehwa kehilangan saudara perempuan karena seorang hero yang tidak dikenal. Sampai sekarang, tidak ada yang tahu siapa pembunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. Tetapi hal itu tidak masalah baginya, karena dia akan menghabisi semua hero yang ada di dunia.

---
Perang berakhir dengan kekalahan para villain. Sekarang dunia dikuasai oleh Hero yang korup. Dan Salah satu Hero tersebut membunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. dia tidak tahu yang mana, tapi tidak masalah. Jika dia membunuh satu per satu, mereka akan ada di antara mereka. Ehwa menjadi Hero killer, Villain yang memburu para Hero setiap malam. "Aku akan membunuh semua orang dan akan mengambil semuanya!"

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/hero-killer/list?title_no=3083)
description.it: Il mondo è in costante fermento, con continue guerre scoppiate tra eroi e cattivi. Dotata di abilità soprannaturali, una ragazza solitaria intraprende un percorso sanguinoso per vendicarsi contro le ingiustizie del mondo in cui vive. Con i continui scontri tra titani, nessuno è al sicuro. Se nessuno è disposto a proteggere gli innocenti, chi sono i veri eroi e chi sono i veri cattivi? Cosa separa veramente l'uno dall'altro?
description.ko:
전쟁은 빌런들의 패배로 막을 내렸다.
이제 세상은 부패한 히어로들이 지배하고 있다.
그리고, 그런 히어로들 중 하나가 이화의 언니를 죽였다.
언니를 죽인 게 누구인지는 모르지만 상관없다.
한 놈씩 죽이다 보면 그중에 있을 테니까.
이화는 매일 밤 영웅들을 사냥하는 빌런, 히어로 킬러가 된다.
​
한 악당의 지독한 액션 활극.
“모조리 죽이고, 빼앗아 주마!”
description.th:
เรื่องราวสงครามระหว่างเหล่าฮีโร่และวายร้ายได้จบลงด้วยชัยชนะของกลุ่มฮีโร่ แต่โลกในตอนนี้กลับปกครองด้วยกลุ่มฮีโร่ที่ฉ้อฉล และหนึ่งในฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นได้ฆาตกรรมพี่สาวของอีฮวา อีฮวาไม่รู้เลยว่าฮีโร่คนไหนที่ลงมือฆ่าพี่สาวของเธอ เธอเลยตัดสินใจไล่ฆ่าพวกฮีโร่ไปทีละคน เธอคิดว่าถ้าฆ่าพวกฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นให้หมด แล้วมันจะนำไปสู้การล้างแค้นให้พี่สาวเธอได้ การล้างแค้นของวายร้ายผู้สิ้นหวังได้เริ่มต้นขึ้น “ฉันจะฆ่าพวกแกทุกคน ฉันจะพรากทุกอย่างที่แกมีไปจากแก”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=2840)
description.zh-hk:
戰爭在反派的敗北下落幕了，而世界由腐敗的英雄們接手掌控。 然而，其中一個英雄殺了苡禾的姐姐。 她不在乎兇手是誰，反正把他們全部殺掉就可以了。 苡禾每晚都會行動，成為了英雄殺手的反派角色。 一個壞蛋的殘忍獵殺行動。「全部殺掉！全部搶走！」

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=5647)

altTitles.ja: 懐かしく思う君は誰

altTitles.en: Who Are You That I Feel Nostalgic For

description.en:
Ten years ago, he used to play a lot with a girl named Oto-chan. They promised to marry if he grew taller than her over the years. With modest but indelible memories in his heart, Hajime Aoima led a normal high school life - until the "promised day" arrived with Oto-chan.

Upon reaching the tree where they had made the promise, what Hajime sees before his eyes is an amazing spectacle. 

A nostalgic and captivating suspense story full of charm and horror!
description.ja:
10年前よく一緒に遊んでいた女の子・オトちゃん。一緒にした背比べ、2人だけの合言葉、そして再会と結婚の約束――。ささやかだが褪せない思い出を胸に、青間はじめは冴えない高校生活を送っていた。そして迎えた、オトちゃんとの「約束の日」。

再会を誓った木の前に訪れると、はじめの目の前には驚くべき光景が広がっていた―。

魅惑と戦慄のノスタルジック・サスペンス！

altTitles.ja: 超くせになりそう♡

altTitles.en: Super! I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡

description.en: ☆ I, Shiratori Nagisa, have a secret that I can't tell anyone. That is, pretending to be a boy and going to a normal junior high school ♡ The popular "I'll Make A Habit Of It ♡" reappears with even more power!!
description.ja: ☆あたし, 白鳥なぎさには、だれにもいえないヒミツがあるの。 それは, 男の子のフリをして,フツーの中学校に通っていること♡大人気の「くせになりそう♡」が,さらにパワーアップして,再登場!!

title.en: Uchi no Hentai Maid ni Osowareteru

altTitles.en: My Hentai Maid is Assaulting Me
My Perverted Maid is Attacking Me

altTitles.ja: うちの変態メイドに襲われてる

description.en:
Spring has come. I, Haruto, am now a university student, and I'm living on my own in an apartment.
However, my father suddenly sent me a "maid" because he was worried about me. This maid is a huge pervert with a dirty mind who spends every day assaulting me with her provocative behavior.

altTitles.ja: 獣人騎士の求愛事情

altTitles.zh-ro: 獸人騎士的求愛二三事

altTitles.zh: 兽人骑士的求爱二三事

description.en: Emma, a human race, has the Duke of the Snake, a beast nobleman. He asked her to work as a magician. It was a request to overcome the unicorn beast of the holy beast species, Lyle, the Knight of the Palace Guards,'s sense of badness... They start training, but start by holding hands, and interact like lovers! I'm... Somehow the skinship is too intense? Courtship love fantasy starting with lessons with unicorn beast knights!

altTitles.ja: 手紙
ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.ja: メイドインアビス

description.en:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
description.ja:
隅々まで探索されつくした世界に、唯一残された秘境の大穴『アビス』。どこまで続くとも知れない深く巨大なその縦穴には、奇妙奇怪な生物たちが生息し、今の人類では作りえない貴重な遺物が眠っている。
「アビス」の不可思議に満ちた姿は人々を魅了し、冒険へと駆り立てた。そうして幾度も大穴に挑戦する冒険者たちは、次第に『探窟家』呼ばれるようになっていった。

アビスの縁に築かれた街『オース』に暮らす孤児のリコは、いつか母のような偉大な探窟家になり、アビスの謎を解き明かすことを夢見ていた。そんなある日、リコはアビスを探窟中に、少年の姿をしたロボットを拾い…？
description.ka: უზარმაზარი გამოქვაბულების სისტემა, რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც უფსკრული, არის ბოლო შეუსწავლელი ადგილი მსოფლიოში. არავინ იცის, რამდენად ღრმად მიდის ეს ტიტანური ორმო, დასახლებული უცნაური და გასაოცარი არსებებით და სავსე იდუმალი უძველესი რელიქვიებით, რომელთა დანიშნულება თანამედროვე ადამიანისთვის უცნობია. თამამი ავანტიურისტთა თაობები მიზიდული იქნა უფსკრულის იდუმალი სიღრმეებით. დროთა განმავლობაში მათ, ვინც საკმარისად გაბედულები გამოიკვლიეს სახიფათო ორმო, გახდნენ ცნობილი როგორც "დელვერები". ორთში, უფსკრულის პირას მდებარე ქალაქში, ცხოვრობს პატარა ობოლი, სახელად რიკო, რომელიც ოცნებობს გახდეს ისეთივე დიდი დელვერი, როგორც დედამისი იყო და ამოხსნას ორმოს დიდი საიდუმლო. ერთ დღეს, ბუნდოვანი სიღრმეების შესწავლისას, ის წააწყდება პატარა ბიჭს, რომელიც აღმოჩნდება, რომ რობოტია…
description.ru: Огромная пещерная система, известная как Бездна, является последним неисследованным местом в мире. В этой титанической яме обитают странные и удивительные существа. Она полна таинственных древних реликвий, предназначение которых неизвестно современному человеку. Поколения смелых авантюристов были затянуты загадочными глубинами Бездны. Со временем достаточно храбрые, чтобы исследовать опасную яму, стали известны как «Исследователи Бездны». В Оосу, городе на краю Бездны, живет маленькая сирота по имени Рико, которая мечтает стать великим пещерным налетчиком, каким была ее мать, и разгадать великую тайну ямы. Однажды, исследуя темные глубины, она натыкается на маленького мальчика, который оказывается роботом...
description.es-la: El enorme sistema de cuevas, conocido como El Abismo, es el último lugar inexplorado en el mundo. Nadie sabe que tan profundo es este agujero titánico, habitado por extrañas y maravillosas criaturas y lleno de misterio y reliquias antiguas de propósito desconocido para la humanidad. Generaciones de valientes aventureros han sido atraídos a las profundidades cripticas del Abismo. Con el paso del tiempo estos exploradores son conocidos como "Exploradores de las Profundidades". En Oath, el pueblo al borde del Abismo, vive una pequeña niña huérfana llamada Riko, que sueña con convertirse en una gran exploradora como su madre y descubrir los misterios del Abismo. Un día explorando las obscuras profundidades se encuentra con un niño, que resulta ser un robot...

title.en: The Heroine Wants Me as Her Sister-in-Law

altTitles.en: The Heroine Has Her Eyes on Me as Her Brother's Wife
The Female Lead Turns Me Into Her New Sister

altTitles.th: นางเอกนิยายปักตำแหน่งพี่สะใภ้ให้ฉัน

altTitles.ja: ヒロインが私を兄嫁にしたがっています

altTitles.zh: 暗黑小红帽认我做嫂嫂

description.en:
I am in the world of a R19 novel based on a Little Red Riding Hood who preys on wolves. The problem is that my younger brother is a wolf. I hid us deep in the forest where Red Riding Hood wouldn't find us, and we're going to escape to the human world safely! But one day, I found a child collapsed in the snow and brought her home in order to treat her. But the girl happened to be the female lead: Little Red Riding Hood! "I don't remember anything." She lost her memories from the accident!

---
Eve was once a human woman who loved to read romance novels. But after being reincarnated as an ice magic-wielding wolf hybreed in one of her favorite stories, Eve runs into a dragon hybreed named Rahel who will kill her in the future and fall in love with her little brother, Sion. Now, Eve thinks her only hope of survival is to save enough money to move to the human world. But as Rahel grows more attached to her, Eve has no idea if she'll cool Rahel's fiery nature or burn in a blazing inferno!

---
**Official Translations:**

description.fr:
C'est le monde du roman de 19 ans basé sur la princesse du Petit Chaperon Rouge qui mange un loup. Le problème, c'est que ce loup est mon petit frère. Je me suis cachée dans la forêt pour que le chaperon rouge ne nous trouve pas. Le but est de s'échapper vers le monde des humains en toute sécurité! Et puis, un jour. J'ai trouvé un enfant qui s'était effondré dans la forêt enneigée. On ne peut pas passer à côté d'un enfant malade. Je l'ai ramenée à la maison en pensant pouvoir la soigner.

C'était le personnage principal féminin, et elle a dit , «Je ne me souviens de rien.»

Pour aggraver les choses, elle a perdu la mémoire dans un accident!

«Je t'aime le mieux du monde!»

J'avais peur de la mort, mais je ne pouvais pas chasser froidement l'enfant malade, alors j'ai pris soin de lui. N'oublie pas ta gratitude même si tu as retrouvé la mémoire plus tard. Mais cet enfant…

«Quel est vôtre type idéal?»

«J'aime les hommes grands et larges d'épaules.»

«Un bel homme? Combien?»

Je pense que tu te poses beaucoup de questions sur moi. C'est mon erreur si vos yeux brillent quand je parle de mon type idéal, non?

---

description.id:
Aku masuk ke dalam novel suram dengan rating dewasa tentang Si Jubah Merah yang berburu serigala. Masalahnya, serigala itu adalah adik laki-lakiku sendiri! Ketika aku berencana untuk bersembunyi ke dalam hutan yang lebat agar nantinya bisa melarikan diri ke dunia manusia bersama adikku, aku menemukan seorang anak yang sedang pingsan di padang bersalju. Karena tidak bisa meninggalkan anak ini sendirian, aku pun merawat anak ini. Tapi, ternyata anak ini adalah Si Jubah Merah yang jahat! Bisakah aku menyelamatkan adikku dari Si Jubah Merah?

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.pt-br: Re:Zero - Capítulo 4: O Santuário e a Bruxa da Ganância

description.en: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
description.es:
Decididos a liberar a Rem de un misterioso letargo, Subaru y Emilia emprenden un nuevo viaje hacia el Santuario en donde se enfrentarán a nuevos peligros que jamás imaginarían.

¡La esperada adaptación del arco 4 comienza aquí!
description.ru: После победы над белым китом и архиепископом греха лени Петельгейзе, Субару наконец воссоединяется с Эмилией. Однако они узнают шокирующие новости, что на Круш с Рем по пути в столицу снова напал культ ведьмы. Круш потеряла свою память, а все воспоминания о Рем у людей были стёрты. Вместе с жителями деревни Субару решает вернуться обратно, однако деревня оказалась пустой. Оставшиеся жители, которые под руководством Рам отправились в так называемое "Святилище", до сих пор не вернулись. Что же там произошло?..

altTitles.ja: うさぎドロップ

description.en: Going home for his grandfather’s funeral, thirty-year-old bachelor Daikichi is floored to discover that the old man had an illegitimate child with a younger lover! The rest of his family is equally shocked and embarrassed by this surprise development, and not one of them wants anything to do with the silent little girl, Rin. In a fit of angry spontaneity, Daikichi decides to take her in himself! But will living with this overgrown teenager of a man help Rin come out of her shell? And hang on, won’t this turn of events spell doom for Daikichi’s love life?!
description.ru: Возвратившись в отчий дом на похороны дедушки, тридцатилетний холостяк Дайкичи обнаружил, что старик нагулял на стороне ребенка. Остальные родственники тоже в шоке и никто не хочет брать на себя ответственность за маленькую и тихую Рин. В порыве возмущения Дайкичи решил забрать девочку к себе. Но сможет ли тридцатилетний холостяк позаботиться о девочке и помочь ей, и не разрушит ли это его жизнь, в том числе и личную?!
description.pt-br: Daikichi, um homem de 30 anos, tinha uma vida relaxada de solteiro até que um dia recebe a notícia de que seu avô morreu. Durante o velório, Daikichi conhece Rin, uma garota de 6 anos que era filha desconhecida do avô e que agora irá para orfanato por não ser desejada pela família. Ao saber disso, Daikichi reage contra essa decisão e acaba preferindo adotar a menina. Esse foi o começo de uma nova vida para Daikichi e Rin, um homem sem experiência com mulheres, e uma menina de 6 anos mais esperta do que um adulto de 30 anos.

altTitles.ja: 最終決戦の漫画

altTitles.en: Adventurers Who Don't Believe in Humanity Will Save the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen Fushin no Boukensha-tachi ga Sekai wo Sukuu you desu

description.en: Life isn’t going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together…?
description.pt-br: A história de quatro aventureiros, todos que experimentaram traição e dificuldades, unindo-se em um "que se foda" a sociedade.

altTitles.en: The Male Lead Is in Charge of the Successor
The Dark History of the Male Lead

altTitles.th: พระเอกบอกให้ฉันรับผิดชอบยุคมืดของเขา

altTitles.ja: 黒歴史の責任を取れですって!?

altTitles.zh: 男主要我对他的黑历史负责

description.en: After being neglected in her past life, Izelle is ecstatic to be reborn as a rich character until her family suddenly goes bankrupt! While thinking about what to do, she's given the perfect chance to solve her financial crisis when she saves young Archduke Karl Byron from being bullied. Unfortunately, Karl doesn't remember her at all when they reunite as adults, and she has no choice but to coerce him into helping her. Can Izelle get what she wants, or will Karl be more trouble than he's worth?

altTitles.ja: アプリコットファズ

description.en:
After school, the secret talk between girls starts today, too. The class madonna, Nanba Rinon, confides to the introvert Furutsuji about the violence she's suffering on a daily basis from her father... To indulge herself in the pleasure of self-pity. 
And Furutsuji who comforts Rinon with deep compassion. However, there's malice lurking inside that smile...
She's realized Rinon's XX.

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

altTitles.ja: 赤い実の花は白

description.en: He is a sunny, hilarious, positive and obscure actor. He is a composed generous and graceful general manager. Because of a strange request, they began a long journey of attracting each other. What should they do? Nonsense, of course becoming lovers.

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

title.en: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu

altTitles.en: The Yandere Little Sister and the Menhera Big Sister

altTitles.es-la: La hermana pequeña Yandere y la hermana mayor Menhera

altTitles.zh: 平良深姐妹都“病”得不轻

altTitles.vi: Hai chị em nhà Herami bất ổn thực sự!

description.en: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
description.ja: せーら（本名：平良深 瀬良）はメイドカフェで働く承認欲求高めな女子（26歳）。そんな彼女の妹・キラは、クールな大人っぽいキャラで人気沸騰中のアイドル（19歳）。しかし、素顔のキラはいつも姉のことしか考えておらず、不安を抱える姉のため、あらゆる手段で励まそうとしていて…。
description.es-la: Sera, (Nombre real: Herami Sera) es una chica que busca aprobación (26 años) que trabaja en un maid café. Su hermana menor, Kira, es una ídolo (19 años) que está ganando popularidad rápidamente con su carácter frío y maduro. Sin embargo, la verdadera Kira solo piensa en su hermana y trata de animarla de todas las maneras posibles para ayudar a su hermana con su salud mental y ansiedad.

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

description.en:
Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

description.en: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
description.it:
Napoli, 2001. Giorno Giovana è un piccolo criminale con il grande sogno di diventare una "Gang-Star". Giorno ha una connessione con la linea sanguigna Joestar, e possiede lo stand "Gold Experience". Il suo sogno inizia a diventare realtà quando incontra Bruno Bucciarati, un partecipante della gang "Passione" e un portatore di stand. Giunti alla conclusione che tutti e due hanno idee simili, e che unanimamente non concordano sugli affari della gang, Giorno rivela il suo obiettivo: con l'aiuto di Bruno, riformerà Passione spodestando il capo della gang.

Giorno, una volta diventato membro di Passione ed entrato nella squadra di Bucciarati, scopre che non è una semplice gang, è piena di portatori di stand. Una volta confrontatesi con le altre squadre, sleali e imprevedibili, scoprono che il loro obiettivo di cambiare la gang dall'interno non sarà facile da raggiungere. Parlando a proposito di questi avversari, Gioeno tenta di ralire tra i ranghi per avvicinarsi al boss, un uomo circondato dal mistero.

自らの女癖の悪さで命を落とし、転生したかつての大賢者・秋葉賢司は

In a world where the supernatural blends in with regular life, there is an old Japanese house. Living there is a newlywed couple, a human man and a kitsune woman. What can disturb their happy life together… except for a man-eating sparrow?

The daily life between human and youkai is dangerous by day, but sweet by night!?

description.en:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself.

The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. 

But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
description.pt:
Durante a viagem escolar Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank-E - um status extremamente baixo em comparação com seus colegas de classe. Assim, o personagem secundário e herói abandonado, se tornara o mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.


---
description.pt-br: Durante a viagem escolar, Touka e seus colegas são convocados para outro mundo. No entanto, Touka foi o único com a classificação mais baixa: Rank E – um status extremamente baixo comparado a seus colegas de classe. Assim, o herói abandonado se tornará absolutamente o demônio mais forte à medida que avança e contra-ataca.

altTitles.ja: 僕の声を聞いてほしい!!

description.en:
Ye QiaoWen, an older sister-childhood-neighbor of our protagonist whom he has always admired has just recently moved back.

But Deng XianHe, the protagonist, has just recently learned that she already has someone else in her heart — a fact that suffers Deng XianHe greatly.

Suddenly seeing his usually bright and capable older sister turn into someone who is always hesitant and confused, Deng XianHe chose to suppress his years-long feelings of love, anguish, and longing.
description.ja:
隣に住んでいた憧れのお姉さん・葉巧玟（イエチャオウェン）がこの町に戻ってきて、なし崩し的に高校生の僕・鄧賢和（ドンシアンホー）と同居することに。いつも颯爽としていてなんでもできる巧姉（チャオねえ）のはずが、僕の前では間抜けで優柔不断でダメダメな社会人だった!? さらに、バイト先で知りあったカッコいい先輩と、素直で明るい同級生。僕を囲む3人の女子はそれぞれが悩みを抱えていて……。楽しくもほろ苦い青春ドラマの幕が上がる!!

---
**Links:**

description.pt-br:
Ye Qiao Wen, uma velha companheira, vizinha de infância de nosso protagonista, a quem ele sempre admirou, mudou-se recentemente.

Mas Deng Xian He, o protagonista, descobriu recentemente que ela já tem outra pessoa em seu coração - um fato que o deixa muito magoado.

De repente, ao ver sua velha companheira, geralmente brilhante e capaz, se transformar em alguém sempre hesitante e confuso, Deng Xian He optou por reprimir seus sentimentos de amor, angústia e saudade que já duravam anos.
description.zh-hk: 從小憧憬的鄰居大姐姐葉巧玟最近搬回來了，但少年鄧賢和卻得知她心中另有所屬的消息，澆熄了鄧賢和多年來的思念。看見平常精明幹練的大姐姐，在自己面前卻變成迷糊、做事猶豫不決的迷茫社會人，少年隱忍着失戀的情緒，第一次想對她發出怒吼，卻還是同

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi-sensei” (“Dreamless-sensei”/“Dream Crusher–sensei”).

description.en: Minato Seno, who has always been very shy since he was young, struggled to make friends during his first few days of high school. He also never got a glimpse of his classmate Nekozane-san's face, as she was always asleep at the desk next to him. However, one day after school, a chance encounter revealed a side of Nekozane-san that was completely different from the one Minato knew in the classroom.
description.ja:
**もっと知りたい きみのこと**
高校1年生・瀬野湊（せのみなと）。新学期早々に担任の教師から頼まれたのは、となりの席でいつも寝ている猫実（ねこざね）さんのこと。超人見知り&引っ込み思案な性格な瀬野…。会話どころか顔すら見たことがない猫実さんを勇気を出して起こそうとしたら、急に彼女から抱きつかれて――!?友達未満なふたりが紡ぐ、無自覚ラブコメ開幕♪

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

altTitles.ja: 怪物になった皇女様

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงปีศาจ

description.en:
'I am the best.' 'I am the best.'

Her half-sister, Judith, who was born as a lowly slave whom she usually looked down on, is the main character of this world, and she herself is destined to lose everything and get involved in forbidden alcohol and meet a miserable end! Arbella, who saw the future, decided that she would live a good life from now on…

“Gerard, if you want to get out of this place, hold my hand.”

"Tell me what you want to do I'll be responsible for the aftermath.”

Wouldn't it be better to keep the younger sister, who will become our future enemy, close by? But for some reason, she feels a bit proud when she sees the kid growing up. Will Arbella be able to meet her dazzling future as she wanted?

---
Camullita Empire's top magician and perfect princess, Arbella, falls ill with an unknown disease one day. On a night when she was writhing in terrible pain as usual, she dreams of her future. There's only one person laughing there, her step-sister Judith! How could a lowly slave-born girl like her dare to take away my glory?! Arbella even tries forbidden magic, but she eventually meets a tragic end. Shedding tears for a moment upon waking up from her dream, Arbella begins to make a plan to survive. 1. Keep her step-sister, who will become her future enemy, close by. 2. Obtain the guardian knight of Judith, who will eventually become a sacrifice for forbidden magic. Fortunately, the plan is smoothly executed, and the two of them are within Arbella's grasp...
description.fr: Arabella, la mage suprême de l'empire Kamulita et la princesse parfaite, tombe un jour malade d'une cause inconnue. Comme d'habitude, une nuit aux prises avec une douleur terrible, elle voit son avenir dans un rêve. La seule personne souriante là-bas, sa demi-sœur Judith! Comment une enfant insignifiante ose-t-elle enlever sa gloire?! Arbella essaie même de s'abstenir d'alcool, mais finit par être misérable. Versant des larmes après s'être réveillée de son rêve, elle ne peut pas mourir comme ça, alors Arbella commence à faire des plans pour vivre: 1. Gardez votre future sœur ennemie à proximité. 2. Acquérir le chevalier d'escorte de Judith, qui sera victime de la boisson interdite à l'avenir. Heureusement, le plan s'est bien déroulé et elle a eu les deux gars entre ses mains... qui continuent à la suivre partout?
description.id: Arbella, Sang Putri Pertama Kekaisaran Camullita, bermimpi tentang masa depan di mana dirinya iri dan mencoba membunuh Judith, Putri Keempat Kekaisaran Camullita yang merupakan anak haram. Di mimpi itu dia menggunakan sihir terlarang namun sihir tersebut gagal dan dia menjadi monster lalu menemui akhirnya.Saat terbangun, dia membangun rencana agar masa depan yang dia lihat tidak terjadi dan dia tidak mati dengan kejam

description.en:
Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

description.en: A hidden love story of a ghost princess who never loved anyone. General Jahyeon of Heeran Nation marries Soru, a ‘princess who sees ghosts’ by the king’s order. Jahyeon is cold to Soru, but he has the power to ward off ghosts, hence Soru wants to stay by his side. Soru is willing to sacrifice everything for Jahyeon, who is her only safe haven. Jahyeon is getting more and more concerned about Soru, but…
description.uk: Таємнича історія кохання принцеси-привида, яка ніколи нікого не любила. Генерал Джа Хьон з нації Хіран одружується із Со Ру, «принцесою, яка бачить привидів», за наказом короля. Джа Хьон холодно ставиться до Со Ру, але якимсь чином він відлякує привидів, тому вона хоче залишитися з ним. Со Ру готова пожертвувати всім заради Джа Хьона, який здатен дати їй відчуття безпеки. Він дедалі більше непокоїться за принцесу, але...

altTitles.ja: レ・セルバン

description.en: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.
description.ru:
Когда очнулась Арсиноя, принцесса страны у подножия горы под названием Хелленталь, с вторжения Илийской империи прошёл уже месяц. В тот день была убита её мать, пробудился злой дракон, а родная земля обратилась в пепел. С помощью «безумицы, поглощающей память» Арсиноя смогла сдержать дракона, но взамен лишилась всех воспоминаний об отце. А теперь на её пути появляется человек по имени Серван и называется её отцом…
Правитель погибшей страны и принцесса, потерявшая память. Сплочённые утратой, вдвоём они отправляются в путешествие ради возрождения былых себя.
description.pt-br: Uma jovem princesa do país montanhoso de Helentar, Arsinoe, acorda e descobre que um mês se passou desde o dia em que o Império de Ilia invadiu. Naquele dia, sua mãe foi morta, um dragão maligno despertou e sua terra natal foi arrasada pelo fogo. Com o poder de Sent Fuana, "Louca que devora memórias", ela é capaz de manter o dragão à distância, mas em troca perde as memórias de seu pai. Agora, um homem que afirma ser seu pai, Cervin, aparece diante dela. Um rei sem pátria e uma princesa sem memória. Duas pessoas reunidas pela perda partem em uma jornada de recuperação.

altTitles.ja: 女将軍✕兵卒

title.en: A Barbarian Was Admitted to the Academy

altTitles.ja: アカデミーにオランケが入学した

description.en:
I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.
